'''''Middle-earth: The Wizards Player Guide''''' is a guidebook for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]. It contains an advanced strategy guide for building and maximizing card decks for [[Middle-earth: The Wizards|The Wizards basic set]]. The book also features pictures and descriptions of all the METW cards.


==Contents==

*Part I - Strategy Guide (pg 4)
*Part II - League Play (pg 43)
*Part III - Card Entries (pg 46)

== From the publisher ==

Ideal for novices and experts alike, this Guide includes a Strategy Guide, a Complete Card Analysis, League Overview, and Sample Decks.
